00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 import pygame
00004 from pygame.locals import *
00005 import time
00006 import os
00007 
00008 pygame.init()
00009 
00010 size = width, height = 640, 480
00011 screen = pygame.display.set_mode(size)
00012 
00013 # Load background
00014 board = pygame.image.load('background.png').convert()
00015 
00016 # Load frog
00017 frog = pygame.image.load('frog.tga').convert()
00018 base_rect = frog.get_rect()
00019 frog_rect = base_rect.move(0,0)
00020 
00021 running = True
00022 while running:
00023     # Event handling
00024     for event in pygame.event.get():
00025         if event.type == QUIT:
00026             running = False
00027         elif event.type == KEYDOWN:
00028             if event.key == K_ESCAPE:
00029                 running = False
00030 
00031             if event.key == K_UP:
00032                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, -40)
00033             elif event.key == K_DOWN:
00034                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, 40)
00035             elif event.key == K_LEFT:
00036                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(-40, 0)
00037             elif event.key == K_RIGHT:
00038                 frog_rect = frog_rect.move(40, 0)
00039                 
00040 
00041     screen.blit(board, board.get_rect())
00042     screen.blit(frog, frog_rect)
00043     pygame.display.flip()
00044 
00045 
00046 pygame.quit()
